message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.io.IOException' import. Should be before 'org.apache.metron.indexing.dao.search.FieldType'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.List' import. Should be before 'org.apache.metron.indexing.dao.search.FieldType'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.Map' import. Should be before 'org.apache.metron.indexing.dao.search.FieldType'.
At-clause should have a non-empty description.
